section.name: Authentication - MD5
section.t: AUTHMD5 is both a capability and a command.

section.name: Authentication - MD5 - Capability
section.t: When sent as a capability, a true or false value follows. When true, it means that AUTHMD5 is supported. When false, it means that AUTHMD5 is not supported.
The highest bit is set to zero (0) which indicates this is a Phoenix defined capability, and not a vendor created and known capability. Followed by the 31-bit capability value.
